Response 1: sadly people have not noticed the end of her talk. it carries the actual gist. if you don't feel for humaneness, you would not like to agree to this talk and construct any ways of revisiting our core practices. 
 Response 2: there is very simple way to turn "bad stress" to "good stress" used by special forces around the world. simple thing that you have to learn to do is following: forget about results, don't think about a result, don't care about any result, simply focus on your performance itself.
